usage.cn: 距离使两颗心靠得更近。
usage.eng: Distance makes the hearts grow fonder.

usage.cn: 永远不是一种距离,而是一种决定。
usage.eng: Eternity is not a distance but a decision.

usage.cn: 尽管我们相隔千里，但在我们的心里面，爱是没有距离的。
usage.eng: No matter how many miles stood between us, love has no distance in our hearts.

usage.cn: 距离会让你遗忘，但是回忆却会永驻。
usage.eng: Distance could make you forget about them, but the memories would always be there.
